pr_title: Fix a bug where grpc-web trailers not compressed

timeline.message:
Fix a bug where grpc-web trailers not compressed
Motivation:
I found a bug while I was implementing it test with akka grpc.
The spec says:
```
10000000b: an uncompressed trailer (as part of the body)
10000001b: a compressed trailer
```
which means that the grpc-web trailers can be compressed.
But our logic does not take account of it.

Modifications:
- Compress grpc-web trailers if the response is sent with the headers which indicates the message will be compressed.
- Decompress grpc-web trailers in the client if it's compressed.

Result:
- You can now recieve the compressed grpc-web trailers.

To-do:
- Support decompression in `GrpcWebUtil` for retrying.
